title: Where is the new name change function in the store after patch 6.10?
body: Pls help, my flatmate kindly decided it would be funny to change my name after I left my account logged in to "mr diddle" from my former "Mr Taine" and I just got enough IP to change it back. Halp x

replies.body:
Go to the shop and over the right hand side there is RP purchase Gifting center and Account.
Go to Account and on the left there will be a Account tab click on that. This should bring up Server transfer and Summoners name change for 13900 IP or 1300 RP.

Hope this helped.
